product_name: Platypus Big Zip LP Reservoir - 2 Liter
long_description: Stay hydrated on the trail or during a long bike ride with the simple, secure Big Zip LP 2-Liter Reservoir from Platypus. Its streamlined design slides easily into your pack for on-the-go sipping.
short_description: Stay hydrated on the trail or during a long bike ride with the simple, secure Big Zip LP 2-Liter Reservoir from Platypus. Its streamlined design slides easily into your pack for on-the-go sipping.
